quote_first: Monsieur Pamplemousse had not one, but several large “pick-me-ups” before he retired for the night. Consequently it took him rather longer than usual to regain consciousness when the phone rang for the seond time. Screwing up his eyes, it was a moment or two before he deciphered the figures
quote_last: on the digital bedside clock, and several more before he finally made sense of what was being said.
title: Monsieur Pamplemousse and the Militant Midwives
author: Michael Bond
